forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. South southeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. Southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
